item.title: The Thirteen Necessary Virtues
item.author: Ben Franklin
item.description: TEMPERANCE Eat not to dullness; drink not to elevation. SILENCE Speak not but what may benefit others or yourself; avoid trifling conversation. ORDER Let all your things have their places; let each part of your business have its time. RESOLUTION Resolve to perform what you ought; perform without fail what you resolve. FRUGALITY Make no expense but to do good to others or yourself; i.e., waste nothing. INDUSTRY Lose no time; be always employ’d in something useful; cut off all unnecessary actions.

item.title: Markdown 基本语法
item.author: Dillon
item.description: 理论充其量只不过是张地图，它代替不了旅行。 – 萧伯纳 《Man and Superman》
